# Profit per væddemål fordeling

```{r}
plot_tau_vs_profit <- function(tau, profit_home, profit_draw, profit_away, model_name = "Model") {

  df <- data.frame(
    tau = tau,
    Hjemmesejr = profit_home,
    Uafgjort = profit_draw,
    Udebanesejr = profit_away
  )

  df_long <- pivot_longer(df, cols = -tau, names_to = "Resultat", values_to = "Profit")

  p <- ggplot(df_long, aes(x = tau, y = Profit, color = Resultat, shape = Resultat)) +
    geom_line(linewidth = 1) +
    geom_point(size = 2.5) +
    scale_color_manual(values = c("blue", "red", "darkgreen")) +
    labs(title = paste("Profit per væddemål vs. τ —", model_name),
         x = expression(tau),
         y = "Profit per væddemål") +
    theme_minimal(base_size = 13) +
    theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, face = "bold"),
          legend.position = "top") + coord_cartesian(ylim = c(-20,40))
  

  print(p)
}
```

# Overskud procent fordeling

```{r}
plot_tau_vs_overskud <- function(tau, overskud_home, overskud_draw, overskud_away, model_name = "Model") {
  df <- data.frame(
    tau = tau,
    Hjemmesejr = overskud_home,
    Uafgjort = overskud_draw ,
    Udebanesejr = overskud_away
  )

  df_long <- tidyr::pivot_longer(df, cols = -tau, names_to = "Resultat", values_to = "Overskud")

  ggplot(df_long, aes(x = tau, y = Overskud, color = Resultat, shape = Resultat)) +
    geom_line(linewidth = 1) +
    geom_point(size = 2.5) +
    scale_color_manual(values = c("blue", "red", "darkgreen")) +
    labs(title = paste("% Overskud vs. τ —", model_name),
         x = expression(tau),
         y = "% Overskud ift. 50%") +
    theme_minimal(base_size = 13) +
    theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, face = "bold"),
          legend.position = "top") +
    coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, 100))
}
```

# CLT 95% fodeling

```{r}
plot_tau_vs_clt <- function(tau, clt_home, clt_draw, clt_away, model_name = "Model") {
  df <- data.frame(
    tau = tau,
    Hjemmesejr = clt_home,
    Uafgjort = clt_draw,
    Udebanesejr = clt_away
  )

  df_long <- tidyr::pivot_longer(df, cols = -tau, names_to = "Resultat", values_to = "CLT")

  ggplot(df_long, aes(x = tau, y = CLT, color = Resultat, shape = Resultat)) +
    geom_line(linewidth = 1) +
    geom_point(size = 2.5) +
    scale_color_manual(values = c("blue", "red", "darkgreen")) +
    labs(title = paste("CLT 95% vs. τ —", model_name),
         x = expression(tau),
         y = "CLT 95% Nedre Grænse") +
    theme_minimal(base_size = 13) +
    theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, face = "bold"),
          legend.position = "top") +
    coord_cartesian(ylim = c(-30, 15))
}
```

# Empirisk 95% fordeling

```{r}
plot_tau_vs_empirisk <- function(tau, emp_home, emp_draw, emp_away, model_name = "Model") {
  df <- data.frame(
    tau = tau,
    Hjemmesejr = emp_home,
    Uafgjort = emp_draw,
    Udebanesejr = emp_away
  )

  df_long <- tidyr::pivot_longer(df, cols = -tau, names_to = "Resultat", values_to = "Empirisk")

  ggplot(df_long, aes(x = tau, y = Empirisk, color = Resultat, shape = Resultat)) +
    geom_line(linewidth = 1) +
    geom_point(size = 2.5) +
    scale_color_manual(values = c("blue", "red", "darkgreen")) +
    labs(title = paste("Empirisk 95% vs. τ —", model_name),
         x = expression(tau),
         y = "Empirisk 95% Nedre Grænse") +
    theme_minimal(base_size = 13) +
    theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, face = "bold"),
          legend.position = "top") +
    coord_cartesian(ylim = c(-30, 15))
}
```
